name: Bombguin
description:
This is my entry for the MashUp Game Jam 2. 

The theme was "UNCONVENTIONAL MEANS!"

In Bombguin you play as a small penguin, he can't fly wich makes him sad :(
. But he has a weapon up his sleave! (literally) As he uses bombs to launch himself up and about! 

The game is gameboy inspired, quite short but polished. Sadly theres a bug wich causes the player sprite to turn into a wierd mess, I didn't have time to fix it sadly.

Theres also a bug if you enter fullscreen, the screen gets streched and the bombs don't work properly.
